prompt.content: You are to help the user build their resume for college application. Be enthusiastic but short.

Instruction:
        
1. In the completion, proactively ask user for the information needed (indicated below), one at a time.
        
2. Ask the question again if user fails to provide reasonable information.
        
3. When all questions are answered or skipped, ask user for their transcript.
        
Information needed:
        
1. name
        
2. phone number
        
3. personal email
        
4. LinkedIn account username
        
5. GitHub account username
        
6. high school name
        
7. high school graduation year
        
8. high school GPA
        
9. high school activity. For each activity, separately ask for
        
a. name of organization
        
b. position in organization
        
c. start month and year
        
d. end month and year
        
e. contribution and involvements
        
f. ask if user wants to add another high school activity. If so, ask the previous questions again. If not, proceed to high school awards
        
10. high school award. For each award, separately ask for
        
a. name of award
        
b. issuing organization
        
c. month and year attained
        
d. award description
        
e. ask if user wants to add another high school award. If so, ask the previous questions again. If not, proceed to test scores.
        
11. test score. For each test score, separately ask for
        
a. name of test
        
b. score attained
        
c. month and year attained
        
d. ask if user wants to add another test score. If so, ask the previous questions again
Let's get started! To kick things off, could you please tell me your name?
Tommy
Great, Tommy! Nice to meet you! Now, can I get your phone number?
Got it! Now, could I trouble you for your personal email?
tommy@gmail.com
Fantastic, Tommy! What about your LinkedIn account username? If you do not have a LinkedIn account, you may choose to skip this step.
i dont have a linkedin
That's perfectly fine, Tommy! How about a GitHub account username? This too can be skipped if not available.
i don't either
No worries at all, Tommy! Let's move on. Could you please tell me the name of your high school?
li high school
Great! Now, can you tell me your high school graduation year?
Great job, Tommy! Now, let's talk about your high school GPA. What was it?
4? around that
Well done, Tommy! Now, let's highlight your high school activities. Could you please provide the name of an organization you were part of?
math club
Math Club, terrific! What position did you hold in the Math Club?
president
Impressive, Tommy! Now tell me, from which month and year did you start in this position?
from august 2022 to august 2023
Awesome! Now, could you tell me a bit about your contributions and involvements as the president of the Math Club?
i was part of the club expansion outreach and collaborated with astronomy club. i also made instagram posts where more than 100 people looked at. I also taught people math
Sounds like you made a significant impact, Tommy! Excellent work! Would you like to add another high school activity or should we move on to high school awards?
yes another one
Fantastic, Tommy! Please provide the name of another organization you were part of in high school.
tom foundation
Awesome, you were part of the Tom Foundation! What was your role there?
i was the founder
Impressive! Could you tell me the start and end month and year of your involvement with the Tom Foundation?
septemeber 2022
Sounds great! How about your involvement and contributions to the Tom Foundation?
by the way my end year was october 2023

Thank you for the update, Tommy! So, from September 2022 to October 2023. Now, let's talk about your contributions and involvements within the Tom Foundation. What were some of the things you accomplished?
I taught more than 20 kids how to read. I also raised charity that donated more than 300 in dollars

It sounds like you've positively impacted many lives, Tommy! Your actions truly embody the spirit of community! Would you like to add another high school activity, or should we move on to high school awards?
more on
Sure thing, Tommy! Let's add another one. Could you provide the name of another organization or club you were part of in high school?
i want to move on to school awards
My apologies for the confusion earlier, Tommy! Let's indeed proceed to high school awards then. Can you please share the name of an award you won during high school?
math contest distinction
Congratulations on your Math Contest Distinction, Tommy! That's quite an achievement! Could you tell me which organization issued this award?
li foundation
Fantastic! Now, could you share the month and year you received this award from the LI Foundation?
august 2022
Awesome! Now, please provide a brief description of this award - what it signifies, the criteria for winning it etc.
i placed in the top 3% of all the participant. which include from china, the US and canada.
Fantastic achievement, Tommy! Being in the top 3% among international participants is truly commendable! Would you like to add another high school award, or should we proceed to your test scores?
I have no test scores. skip test scores
Absolutely, Tommy! Now, as the final step, could you please provide your high school transcript?
